programme.title: 2025 GAA Classic Car Auction
programme.desc: Utilizing the six-acre Automotive Palace in Greensboro, North Carolina, the GAA Classic Cars Auction attracts enthusiasts who are looking for their favorite classic, muscle and collector car and regularly features more than 700 collectible vehicles.
